long_description: Built in classic military style, the heavy-duty Brunton 9077 lensatic compass is ideal for sighting and following bearings in the field. Durable metal housing protects a liquid-dampened compass dial; long straight-side design makes it easy to use with a map. Flip-up cover with sighting wire and flip-up lens allow you to take bearings accurate to within 5deg. Luminous points on compass dial aids taking readings at night. Flip-down thumb loop helps stabilize compass for fast, accurate readings.
short_description: Built in classic military style, the heavy-duty Brunton 9077 lensatic compass is ideal for sighting and following bearings in the field.
